text: adeul-ui naiga geuwa hamkke ilhal naie ileuleoss-eul ttae geuga malhagil nae adeul-a neoleul jedan-e eul lilaneun myeonglyeong-eul naega kkum-eseo boass nola neoui saeng-gag-i eotteonji algo sip guna lago hani adeul-i malhagil a beoji dangsinkkeseo myeonglyeongbad-eun daelo ha obsoseo hananimkkeseo innaehaneun jong-eu lobuteo wonhasindamyeon dangsinkkeseo jeoleul balgyeonhal geos-ibnida hayeossdeola
